page.title: 15Religion
page.content: In Dunston there is a church,It is called St Peter's.In 1873 it was burnt down.1 year later it was rebuilt.It took 2 years to rebuild.Some of the original materials were used.In the fire a stained glass window was ruined and R H Carpenter had to raise a lot of money to have a new stained glass window put in. In Dunston there is a very old Methodist Chapel.I think the chapel is soon going to be closed because hardly anybody goes there and the only people that do are very old. In Nocton there is a church.It has nice surroundings.It is called All Saints.There is also a church that is very spookey and dirty.
